Name: Family Curse
Description: While resolving a test, only 6s count as successes. You cannot become BLESSED or CURSED.

Name: Never Give Up
Description: After you fail a test, you focus one skill of your choice.

Name: Trust Fund
Description: Action: If you have fewer than $3, you gain $3.

Name: Smoky Velvet
Description: Once per round, after you perform an action, another investigator on any space may perform that same action. (Normal action restrictions still apply)

Name: Magical Gift
Description: Once per round, while resolving a LORE test, you may reroll one or all of your dice.

Name: In the Stars
Description: After you remove two or more doom from your space, you may suffer one horror to research one clue (place it on the scenario sheet).

Name: Love For the Job
Description: After you perform a gather resources action, you may focus one skill of your choice.

Name: Shortcut
Description: Before or after you perform an additional action as part of an evade action, you may move up to two spaces (for free).

Name: Out for Revenge
Description: After you defeat a monster as part of an attack action, you recover one sanity or focus one skill of your choice.

Name: Friend Indeed
Description: Action: You may exchange any amount of healthj and/or sanity with another investigator or ally in any space.

Name: Blood Casting
Description: You may suffer damage instead of horror while casting a spell.

Name: Blood is Power
Description: While casting a spell, if you suffer damage or spend remnants, you get +2 Lore.

Name: Shield From Harm
Description: If a monster would engage another investigator in your space, you may engage that monster instead.

Name: All Around You
Description: Once per round, while resolving a test, you or another investigator in your space may reroll dice up to the number of clues in your neighborhood.
